DocumentationDefinitionList.Title: VfsAccessBean: Useful properties to explore resources in the VFS
DocumentationDefinitionList.Heading: List of useful properties to explore resources in the VFS

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Returns true if a resource, whose URI is given as key, exists.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Returns true if a resource, whose URI is given as key, exists and is an XML content or XML page.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Given an URI as key, a lazy map with property names as keys and their values as values is returned.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Like property, but the returned map contains also inherited values for properties.
